description.value:
Sanctioned Psykers who allow for communication across the galaxy and who can bend reality with the power of the warp. (See Psychic Powers Page to choose Psychic Powers)
Skills: Awareness, Common Lore (Adeptus Astra Telepathica), Forbidden Lore (Psykers), Invocation, Psyniscience, Scholastic Lore (Crytography), Speak Language (High Gothic, Low Gothic).
Talents: Pistol Weapon Training (Universal), Heightened Senses (Sound), Psy Rating 2, Psychic Technique (x2)(200xp), Psychic Discipline (Telepathy). Psychic Technique (Astral Telepathy).
Gear: Best Laspistol or Best Stub Automatic, Best Mono-sword or Common Shock Staff, Guard Flak Armour, Charm, Void Suit, Microbead, Psy-Focus.
Special Abilities: Soul-Bound: Gain +20 to Willpower Tests to resist daemonic possession in any opposed Willpower Test to resist talents, psychic powers, abilities, or other effects from a daemon. Roll additional d10 when rolling Perils of the Warp, then discard one of choice. See Without Eyes: Are blind, see with psychic senses, ignore effects that target vision such as blind grenades or cameleoline, cannot see Untouchables. Power of Fate: Can spend 1 Fate Point to add +1 to Psy Rating for a single Focus Power Test.

talents: or other effects from a daemon

specialAbilities.name: Special Ability
specialAbilities.description: Abilities: Soul-Bound: Gain +20 to Willpower Tests to resist daemonic possession in any opposed Willpower Test  to resist talents, psychic powers, abilities, or other effects from a daemon. Roll additional d10 when rolling Perils of the Warp, then discard one of choice
